room_title: Escape room "Travel Agency" by Escape Room Park City in Salt Lake City
review: The 4 of us , 2 couples , went last night and did the travel agent escape room. It was a hoot. Great way to spend a snowy eve in Park City. Incredibly friendly staff and the price is perfect for a night of fun. Lots of family bonding and memories madeThey even told us about great wood fired pizza place for after “escape “ snack

room_title: Escape room "Travel Agency" by Escape Room Park City in Salt Lake City
review: Did this with my family during our recent trip to Park City. Looking for something to do while it rained, we landed on this. We did the Travel Room as our first-ever escape room! This was a great puzzle for our group, and we had a blast! Absolutely would come back and try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Travel Agency" by Escape Room Park City in Salt Lake City
review: One of the more interesting escape rooms I've done. My buddy and I spontaneously decided to do the Travel Room on a whim. Lots of little things to touch and play with, and a lot of the clues were very creative. Our GM was ridiculously fun to talk to, and the hints she gave us were clever and fun. We had a ton of fun!
